column4: hi i have installed vlc media player fr ubuntu 9.10 but its not visible any where in the system
can you run it from terminal by typing vlc?
try reinstalling it first do sudo apt-get remove --purge vlc and then sudo apt-get install vlc
then install it sudo apt-get install vlc
which versino of ubuntu you are using?
then go to applications>software center> and search for term vlc then you can see vlc click on install
